p: The phenolic derivatives 14– 16 were prepared as described in Scheme 2. N-hydroxy-5-norbornene-2,3-dicarboximide was reacted with epichlorohydrin to give the epoxide 39. The treatment of 39 with an excess of iPrNH 2 or tBuNH 2 afforded amino alcohol 40 or 41. Oxyamines 42 and 43 were obtained by aminolysis with NH 3-MeOH 7 N of 40 or 41.
